price: 39. Of hebben jullie eden van Ons, die tot de dag der opstanding reiken, dat er voor jullie dat is wat jullie oordelen.
arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am lakum aymānun ʿalaynā bālighatun ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati inna lakum lamā taḥkumūna
